name: Hilton Vancouver Metrotown
description: Modern hotel with a heated rooftop pool & hot tub, plus a restaurant/lounge & meeting space.
address: Hilton Vancouver Metrotown, 6083 McKay Ave, Burnaby, BC V5H 2W7

featured_reviews.review_id:
A great hotel at a very good location for a reasonable price. Rooms are simple (for instance, the living room was pretty bare) but are well maintained and cleaned daily.

I stayed in a suite at a high floor. It offered an unblocked view of the Vancouver suburbs, with minimal tall buildings blocking the view.
featured_reviews.review_text:
A great hotel at a very good location for a reasonable price. Rooms are simple (for instance, the living room was pretty bare) but are well maintained and cleaned daily.

I stayed in a suite at a high floor. It offered an unblocked view of the Vancouver suburbs, with minimal tall buildings blocking the view.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Convenient location (close to transit, shopping and many restaurants).

Staff were friendly.  Lobby of hotel was very clean.

Room was okay.  Windows do not open so it felt stuffy.  AC was loud but had to keep it going overnight to keep  the temperature comfortable.  Micro fridge with no freezer for cold packs.  Nice deep bath tub but grout on tiled walls needed to be cleaned better.

Also, felt bad for the people with rooms right by the ice machine on my floor....it was very loud all the time.
featured_reviews.review_text:
Convenient location (close to transit, shopping and many restaurants).

Staff were friendly.  Lobby of hotel was very clean.

Room was okay.  Windows do not open so it felt stuffy.  AC was loud but had to keep it going overnight to keep  the temperature comfortable.  Micro fridge with no freezer for cold packs.  Nice deep bath tub but grout on tiled walls needed to be cleaned better.

Also, felt bad for the people with rooms right by the ice machine on my floor....it was very loud all the time.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lisa, thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We're glad to hear that you found our location convenient, lobby clean, and our staff friendly. However, we apologize for the maintenance issues and noise disturbances you encountered during your stay. We understand how important a peaceful and comfortable environment is for a good night's sleep, and we'll address these issues with our team. If you have any further details about your booking or would like to discuss your experience in more detail, please reach out to our support team at https://help.hilton.com/s/contactsupport or (604) 438-1200. We're here to assist you. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a more enjoyable stay.

featured_reviews.review_id: We just returned from our stay and could not be happier with our hotel experience.  This location was perfect for our needs. Several great restaurants across the street and the concierge did a great job helping us find everything.  The hotel rooms were spacious and clean. Prices were very reasonable.  This was a family trip to see Vancouver and we are so happy we chose this hotel.
featured_reviews.review_text: We just returned from our stay and could not be happier with our hotel experience.  This location was perfect for our needs. Several great restaurants across the street and the concierge did a great job helping us find everything.  The hotel rooms were spacious and clean. Prices were very reasonable.  This was a family trip to see Vancouver and we are so happy we chose this hotel.

featured_reviews.review_id: Room was spacious had a lounge chair in the room and a desk and chair and nice size tv.  The shower had shampoo and conditioner and body wash in there already so you don't have to bring your own and nice brand also.  The ac was quiet enough and room wasn't too warm as we went in the summer to this hotel. The Metrotown mall is right beside the hotel also Station Square lots of shopping and food right across the street great area for all.
featured_reviews.review_text: Room was spacious had a lounge chair in the room and a desk and chair and nice size tv.  The shower had shampoo and conditioner and body wash in there already so you don't have to bring your own and nice brand also. featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jeff, thank you for sharing your positive experience with us at Hilton. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed the spacious room with its amenities, including the lounge chair, desk, and TV. It's great that you found the shower stocked with quality shampoo, conditioner, and body wash. We're also pleased to know that the AC kept the room comfortable during your summer stay. We appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back soon.

featured_reviews.review_id:
The rooms are clean, the bathtubs are amazing. We stayed there the night of our wedding and it was great

We misses breakfast and the lady in the kitchen made us breakfast anyway. Have a super nice the staff like above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable.
featured_reviews.review_text:
The rooms are clean, the bathtubs are amazing. We stayed there the night of our wedding and it was great

We misses breakfast and the lady in the kitchen made us breakfast anyway. Have a super nice the staff like above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Had a great stay here. Room was clean and comfortable, we had a suite which was nice. The Breakfast Buffet included for Gold Members was very good, lots of options. Location is super convenient next to the Skytrain (easy ride downtown) and malls/shopping. Price was a lot cheaper than staying downtown but still well located. Parking wasn't too bad for an urban area.

Only complaint is one morning, I think they only had one elevator running, and we literally waited on our floor for an elevator for about 15 minutes (5 minutes for the first which was already full, then another 10 for the second which had room). But I think that was a short lived problem, the rest of the stay we didn't have any issues.

featured_reviews.review_id: Good location. Pool and hot tub are tiny, much smaller than expected, but it is nice to have the amenities. Room was big and kept very clean. Staff was friendly and inviting. Restaurant was very expensive (shocked to pay 5$ for a small size and average tasting coffee).
featured_reviews.review_text: Good location. Pool and hot tub are tiny, much smaller than expected, but it is nice to have the amenities. Room was big and kept very clean. Staff was friendly and inviting. Restaurant was very expensive (shocked to pay 5$ for a small size and average tasting coffee).
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nikki- We're glad to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and spacious, clean rooms. We apologize for any disappointment caused by the size of our pool and hot tub. Your comments about our friendly staff are greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome you back soon.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Super clean and friendly staff. Not super conveniently located but they do have a few restaurants downstairs at the Crystal Mall. Parking is underground and confusing.
This might be my new hotel when I visit BC
The restaurant in the hotel(3rd floor) is also pretty good. The staff there are also super friendly.
